The Fool.text: Embracing the innocent, spontaneous aspect of the psyche

The Magician.text: Activating personal will and conscious manifestation

The High Priestess.text: Accessing the anima and intuitive wisdom

The Empress.text: Nurturing the creative, fertile aspects of consciousness

The Emperor.text: Establishing order, structure, and paternal authority

The Hierophant.text: Seeking wisdom through tradition and collective knowledge

The Lovers.text: Integrating opposites and making conscious choices

The Chariot.text: Directing willpower toward a specific goal

The Hermit.text: Turning inward for self-discovery and enlightenment

Wheel of Fortune.text: Understanding cycles and surrendering to greater forces

Death.text: Transforming through letting go of outdated patterns

Temperance.text: Harmonizing opposing forces within the psyche

The Devil.text: Confronting shadow aspects and material attachments

The Star.text: Connecting with hope and spiritual guidance

The Moon.text: Navigating the unconscious and facing illusions

The World.text: Achieving wholeness and completion of a cycle

Wands.text: Exploring motivation, passion, and the drive for self-expression

Cups.text: Processing emotions, relationships, and the feeling function

Swords.text: Engaging with thoughts, communication, and mental challenges

Pentacles.text: Focusing on sensation, security, and material manifestation

major_arcana.text: Working with archetypal energies to integrate aspects of the collective unconscious

suit.text: Integrating practical life experiences into psychological growth
